# Cure Critical Wounds (Spell)
## Overview
[[Conjuration Spells|Conjuration]] ([[Healing Spells|healing]])

**Level:** [[4th Level Bard Spells|Bard 4]], [[4th Level Cleric Spells|Cleric 4]], [[5th Level Druid Spells|Druid 5]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 7th-Level Cleric Spells List|Cleric 7]], [[BoXM 9th-Level Druid Spells List|Druid 9]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S

**Range:** Touch

**Target:** Creature touched

**Duration:** Instantaneous

**Saving Throw:** Will half (harmless); see text

**Spell Resistance:** Yes (harmless); see text

**Source:** PF Core Rulebook, pg. 263

This spell functions like *[[Cure Light Wounds (Spell)|cure light wounds]]*, except that it cures 4d8 points of damage + 1 point per caster level (maximum +20).
